title: Go Ask Alice
description: AliceCOULD BE ANYONE. AliceCOULD BE SOMEONE YOU KNOW. AliceUSES DRUGS. With over a million copies in print, Go Ask Alice has become a classic of our time. This powerful real-life diary of a teenager's struggle with the seductive -- often fatal -- world of drugs and addiction tells the truth about drugs in strong and authentic voice. Tough and uncompromising, honest and disturbing -- and even more poignant today -- Go Ask Alice is page-turning and provocative reading.
author: Beatrice Sparks
